title: Mystery of the Spirit
overview: "She has died for crimes she did not commit, and so now she holds a grudge and waits for revenge. Waiting in this house, the slave house." The house that belongs to Phraya Thammanurak, is well known as a haunted house. Until one day, when the ghost who was detained in the house is released. Now she will take revenge for herself and her child. And the true evil form of the actual perpetrator will be revealed.
